title: Putumayo presents: Brazilian Lounge (2006)
description:
Wonderfully slick, urban Brazilian music fills Ã¢â‚¬Å“Brazilian LoungeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2006) from start to finish.
 
The tunes are essentially what one would expect as ambient background music in a documentary on modern Rio, but the sound indeed goes past that somewhat. The basic format for much of it is electronica meets samba or bossa, but excellently executed.

A highly consistent album, rarely leaving the realm of the key groove.


Various Artists
